Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.developmentcard

Class DevelopmentCardHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.developmentcard.DevelopmentCardHandler
public class DevelopmentCardHandler
extends java.lang.Object
DevelopmentCardHandler manages the Player's DevelopmentCards during the play
Author:
davide grazioli

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DevelopmentCardHandler()
    Constructor of the class, creates an empty collection of active and an empty collection of non-active DevelopmentCard

    • DevelopmentCardHandler

      public DevelopmentCardHandler()
      Constructor of the class, creates an empty collection of active and an empty collection of non-active DevelopmentCard

  • Method Details

    • getActiveDevelopmentCard

      public java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> getActiveDevelopmentCard()
      Return an Arraylist of the cards i can active the Development power
      Returns:
      A copy of activeDevelopmentCard

    • getDevelopmentCardColl

      public java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> getDevelopmentCardColl()
      Return all the card a player has in him gameBoard
      Returns:
      A copy of developmentCardColl that is a collection of all the cards a player has

    • setActiveDevelopmentCard

      public void setActiveDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard cardBought, int selectedPosition) throws DevelopmentCardException
      Put the development card bought in selected position, if a player choose a valid position
      Parameters:
      cardBought - card the player Bought at Market and want to activate
      selectedPosition - The selectedPosition is the position of the card to substitute, starting from zero
      Throws:
      DevelopmentCardException

    • checkBoughtable

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> checkBoughtable​(int cardLevel)
      Check if a player could buy a card, giving him the position where he could put the bought card
      Parameters:
      cardLevel - level of the card the player bought (from 1 to 3)
      Returns:
      An arraylist with boolean that specifies for every position if the player could put the bought card in that space (true if he can, false if he can't)

    • checkDevelopmentCard

      public boolean checkDevelopmentCard​(java.util.ArrayList<CardColor> colorToCheck, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> levelToCheck) throws DevelopmentCardException
      Check if a Player's collection of development card satisfy requirements of color and level in input
      Parameters:
      colorToCheck - describe in an ArrayList the color of the card to check if present
      levelToCheck - describe in an ArrayList the color of the card to check if present
      Returns:
      true if all the colors and them level in ArrayList are present in my collection false if not
      Throws:
      DevelopmentCardException

    • checkCountDevelopmentCard

      public int checkCountDevelopmentCard​(CardColor color)
      Count the number of the Development card of a specified color a Player has
      Parameters:
      color - specifies the color of a DevelopmentCard which you want to know the count
      Returns:
      how many DevelopmentCards of a specified color a player has

    • checkCountDevelopmentCard

      public boolean checkCountDevelopmentCard​(CardColor color, int quantity)
      check if a player has at least a specified number of DevelopmentCard of a specified color
      Parameters:
      color - the color to check
      quantity - the quantity to verify
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least the specified number of the specified color of DevelopmentCards
